item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Long time ago I had a blog. Then I had another one. Then I had made several wannabe blogs that never saw the light. At the end it always dies due to the lack of habit. This time I will try harder (but no promises given).

However one thing is sure and it begins with

Hello World!

package main
import "fmt"

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, 世界")
}

This is Hello World written in golang. I think I hate golang but that’s in what Hugo is written in. And I chose to run this blog with it so I would give it some honor points in being useful for something.

So farewell for now.
